org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.transreceive
Class AePersistentTransmissionTracker

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.transreceive.AeNoopTransmissionTracker
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.transreceive.AeInMemoryTransmissionTracker
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.transreceive.AePersistentTransmissionTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeTransmissionTracker
public class AePersistentTransmissionTracker
extends AeInMemoryTransmissionTracker

Implements the persistent version of a transmission manager which is required for durable invokes and durable replies.
